name: The Shifter (Ghostskill24)
description:
All alone.

You are tasked with exploring the basement of an old house. No one has ever went into this basement, so its unclear what could be down there.

This is a short 5 to 15 minute experience and is my very first game! At first this wasn't going to be a scary game, but I liked the atmosphere with the lack of lighting that I decided to just roll with it.

Definitely leave me feedback! I'd love to hear what you think, how I could improve, or if you liked it or hated it.

If you find any bugs, absolutely let me know.
